title: Physical Chemistry II
description: Quantum mechanics, atomic and molecular structure, bonding theory, molecular spectroscopy, statistical mechanics.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHEM 1311 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 1212K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
